title: Looking for Gold-Plat players (SERIOUS)
body:
Hello,

     We are Quantum Esports and we are looking for members for our Ranked 5's team, The team is to be taken seriously so if you are not about trying to win, playing in tourneys, and having scheduled practice at least twice a week then the team is not for you, Now to get into the stuff you actually care about we need a top, jungle, and support for our team. Please fill out the form below and comment it below, If you try to add me on League I will ignore it.

**Age-
Time Zone-
How often you play-
Role-
Best Champions-
Do you have Curse Voice and a working Microphone?-**

Hope to talk to some of you soon thanks!
